Selecting Items by Label

Attaching a label to a set of items allows you to select those items from the upper pane based on the label. This feature can be convenient for grouping a specific set of items together.

To select items from the upper pane by label:

  1. Select a folder from the folder hierarchy.

  2. Click a component tab.

  3. Choose Select > By Label from the component or context menu. The Select a Label dialog lists all existing labels and identifies them as view or revision labels. By default, both the View labels and Revision labels check boxes are selected.

  4. To limit the list to a specific type of label, clear the appropriate check box.

  5. Select the label of interest. This action selects the items with this label in the upper pane so that you can print reports about them, check them out, etc.
